entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning and late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and a few snow squalls ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
